title: Dear mother
creator_credit: Judith Mahfoud and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: Life wasn’t meant to be easy, but it still can be profoundly beautiful. Judith delves into the childhood of her mother, to try to understand her better so she can pass this knowledge to her five sons and to honour the life of her mother, who grew up feeling like she was nobody’s child.
